content.rendered:
Jiliaaa SevenSevenSeven is an online casino slot machine game that feature classic slot symbols like lucky seven, diamond, and BARs. The game designed with simple and easy-to-understand interface, making it accessible both novice and experienced players. With its bright and colorful graphics and engaging sound effects, player can enjoy an immersive gaming experience while trying their luck at win their bet.The game features three reels and eight paylines, giving players multiple chances to win with each spin. Jiliaaa SevenSevenSeven is a fun and straightforward slot game that is perfect for player who enjoy the simplicity of classic slot machines. With its exciting gameplay and the potential for big wins, it’s no wonder why this game has become a popular choice among online casino players.

Seven Seven Seven Game Rules

JILI slot 777 is an online slot game created by Jili Games with this concept. You will find that this game has a bright icon, interesting visual effects, and high rewards. This game is an online slot machine with 3×3 reels. There are up to 5 pay lines in the game. There are big shiny icons, silver reels, a matrix that looks like a classic slot machine, an abstract purple background image, and a lever.

  • Main Game: Bet line wins if 3 identical symbols appear from the left to the right according to the paytable.
  • Main Game winnings = Odds x (Bet / 5).
  • Bonus Game Diamond Line :Bet line wins if identical symbols appear from the left to the right according to the paytable.
  • Bonus Game Triple、Blazing : Bet line wins if 3 identical symbols appear from the left to the right according to the paytable.
  • Free Game winnings = Odds x Bet.
  • In the event of any malfunction that causes the outcome of a game to be unclear, that round will be invalid.

Special Symbols

  • Bonus Game 1 : Triple
  • Only appear on the Frist Reel
  • Bonus Game 2 : Blazing
  • Only appear on the Second Reel
  • Bonus Game 3 : Diamond Line
  • Only appear on the Third Reel

Bonus Game

  • Collect two or more Scatters to activate the corresponding Bonus Game.
  • 3 kinds of small reel responding 3 rewards when activating the Free Game, there are expand at most 3 reels randomly each kind.
  • When a Free Game is over and you will automatically trigger the next type of Free Game until all of Free Games are done.
